definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: This process requires that the adder used in multibit addition handle three inputs.
sentences.chinese: 这就要求用于多位数相加的加法器具有三个输入端。

sentences.english: Admiring it and adding noughts in vain.
sentences.chinese: 赞赏着它，徒劳地做着零与零的加法。

sentences.english: An example of semigroup with no minimal ideal is the set of positive integers under addition.
sentences.chinese: 没有极小理想的半群的例子是在加法下的正整数集合。

sentences.english: Having thus mastered addition, they move on to subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 如此这般地掌握了加法之后，他们又转向减法。

sentences.english: The effect of the additive coloured noise on mode-competition of a two-mode laser is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了加法色噪声对双模激光竞争效应的影响。

sentences.english: You would expect multiplication, for example, to have a higher precedence than addition.
sentences.chinese: 例如，您期望乘法的优先级比加法高。

sentences.english: In the modern computer, adder exists in the arithmetic logic unit into.
sentences.chinese: 在现代的电脑中，加法器存在于算术逻辑单元之中。

sentences.english: This adder can realize the optical arithmetic operation with two inputs.
sentences.chinese: 该加法器可以实现两输入的光学算术运算。

sentences.english: This paper deals with orthodox semirings whose additive idempotents satisfy permutation identities.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究加法幂等元满足置换等式的纯整半环。

sentences.english: Soul grows more by substraction than by addition.
sentences.chinese: 减法比加法更能使灵魂成长。

sentences.english: This method is invertible through simple expansion and additional operations.
sentences.chinese: 通过简单的展开运算和加法操作就可实现逆变换。

sentences.english: Based on the presented idea, the excellent random b…
sentences.chinese: 根据这种理论，可以推导得到最优的任意位加法器。

sentences.english: An LAB-wide carry-in bit selects which chain is used for the addition of given inputs.
sentences.chinese: 一个LAB宽进位选择哪个链用于特定输入的加法。

sentences.english: You should also see the return values of the add and subtract operations.
sentences.chinese: 您也应该看到加法操作和减法操作的返回值。

sentences.english: Learn to add responsibly instead of subtracting.
sentences.chinese: 学会负负责任地使用加法并取代减法。

sentences.english: In the modern computer, the adder being present in the arithmetic logic unit.
sentences.chinese: 在现代的电脑中，加法器存在于算术逻辑单元之中。

definition: four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
to square a number/to calculate the square
